EMPLOYMENT
Commercial
I have exceeded consistently AOPs for every financial year since 2013
January 2018-Current
Senior Technical Sales Specialist. ThermoFisher Scientific (North UK) –
2018 TSS award at Life Science Solutions Group (Formerly Life Technologies).
Strategic Business Development to accelerate double digit growth on Flow Cytometry, Antibodies and Immunoassay portfolio in Biotech, Biopharma, Academia and CROs.
2018 at 108% vs AOP (18% growth vs prior year), 20% YTD growth in 2019.
Coach sales team members to be successful, effective and strategic sales representatives within their territories.
November 2016- January 2018
Strategic Key Accounts Sales Manager. Hologic Molecular Diagnostic Solutions
Line management: 2 direct reports, FAS and a service engineer
Ranked Top 3 Key Accounts Sales Manager in EMEA in 2017 at Hologic DX
Exceeded targets for 4 consecutive Quarters (118% vs AOPs, 30% organic  growth)
Successfully signed new substantial contracts including Royal Liverpool NHS (£5M), Manchester Royal Infirmary (£1.4M), Sheffield NHS (£1.5M) and Leeds NHS (£2.1M)
Developed and executed strategic business plans for targeted key accounts
Identified revenue growth opportunities via acquisition of new customers and expanding portfolio usage (equipment and reagents) with existing NHS/private diagnostic labs
Managed complex sales activities, tender bids, submissions and negotiations
July 2016-November 2016
Sales Manager, (UK & Ireland). Philips Biocell (Philips Healthcare-Emerging Businesses)
Line management: 3 direct reports, 2 sales reps, and a FAS.
Philips ceased Biocell within 4 months of joining the company. Q1 at 300% vs PY
Develop and perform the sales activities in the UK & Ireland for the oCelloScope (automated real time cell imaging and quantifying platform)
Build the UK organization and recruit a field sales force for the UK & Ireland
Define and execute the commercial strategy for the UK & Ireland in conjunction with the international marketing and sales teams
Determine the attractiveness of identified business ideas and develop compelling business cases, to get qualification by the CEO and the necessary budget for further development into a business
November 2013-July 2016
Life Science Sales Specialist/Territory Sales Manager. Fisher Scientific UK (part of ThermoFisher Scientific)
Identifying & developing to completion Life Sciences business opportunities (reagents and equipment) in Pharma/Biotech, Industrial, Diagnostic & Academic segments
Manage a £14.6 million Life Sciences territory including £10.2 million of Life Technologies (Invitrogen, Applied Biosystems and Gibco) products. 110% vs AOPs for 2016, 107% for 2015, and 108% for 2014
Successfully achieved over 50% growth 3 years consecutively of Fisher Scientific Life Sciences business within the North West region. Growth revenues of over £600,000
Grow revenue & margin to AOP target for specific life science vendor portfolio including Life Technologies, GE Life Sciences & Thermo Scientific amongst others
January 2009- June 2012 (Self-employed)
International Commercial Distributor. Monavie UK LTD,
Distribute Monavie health products to customers within the UK and Brazil.
Establish new distributor networks in conjunction with HQ marke

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
